newsitem.title: USA: NetVantage in pact with Lucent.
newsitem.headline: NetVantage in pact with Lucent.

text.p: NetVantage Inc said Wednesday it has signed a preliminary agreement to allow Lucent Technologies Inc to license its new Ethernet switching technology.
The agreement calls for Lucent to make and market switching products under its own name in addition to supplying chipsets for incorporation in NetVantage's Ethernet products.

A NetVantage spokesman said the so-called Application Specific Integrated Circuit (ASIC)-based system reduces the size of a product designed to eliminate Intranet and local area network (LAN) traffic flow problems to the size of a single chip rather than a plug-in board.
Financial terms were not disclosed, although a definitive agreement is expected to be signed within 45 days.
NetVantage designs Ethernet workgroup switching systems.
Its shares were up 1/2 Wednesday at 7-1/2.
